project(external_sdl)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
if (${EELY_PLATFORM} STREQUAL ${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64})
  set_target_properties(
    ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_IMPLIB_DEBUG ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/debug/SDL2.lib
    IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELEASE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/release/SDL2.lib
    IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/debug/SDL2.dll
    IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/release/SDL2.dll
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

  add_library(${PROJECT_NAME}_main STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
  set_target_properties(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}_main PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/debug/SDL2main.lib
    IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/${EELY_PLATFORM_WIN64}/release/SDL2main.lib
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
else()
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Platform is not supported")
endif()
